alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 6:12AM CDT until April 10 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine. * WHEN...From this evening to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Hawks Road near the gauge becomes flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 19.9 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Bayou Anacoco Rosepine 17.0 10.4 Fri 5 am CDT 18.5 19.9 16.9 &&
